title: BBC Radio's Daniel Carter | Louder Than Life Recap | Beam Legacy 15-Year
itunes:title: BBC Radio's Daniel Carter | Louder Than Life Recap | Beam Legacy 15-Year
description:
Backstage in Fred's bar at Louder Than Life,  BBC Radio's Daniel Carter joins him to discuss the four day music and whiskey festival that Headlined Nine Inch Nails, KISS, Slipknot and Red Hot Chili Peppers. Over a few wee drams, Fred and Daniel share their favorite moments of the hard rock festival. 

Other points: Is Metallica's whiskey good? Is it awkward talking to GWAR? Does KiSS Live up to the hype?

Learn more about Daniel Carter: https://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/profiles/15GvsKYP06qNwcLfyLfnYh8/daniel-p-carter-profile
